domain

Class AutoAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.AutoAlgorithm

  • public class AutoAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    The AutoAlgorithm is responsible for compressing and decompressing multiple files automatically given a specific algorithm and compression quality (JPEG) It is also responsible for saving stats of all the compressions made of all the files. It differs from other algorithms in that it does not know anything about compression, and ir requires an Algorithm to compress the file for it. The basic functionality in some way is to encode the compressions and decode the decompressions

    • Field Summary

      private int currentID
      This is the selected compression algorithm

      This is an iterator, that points to the current byte in the file
      private Stats stats
      This saves the average stats for all the file compressions
      private static java.lang.String unsupportedFile
      This string is null always except when an unsupported file is being compressed in than case it saves the path to that file
